import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {NgForm} from "@angular/forms"; @Component({ selector: 'app-auth', templateUrl: './auth.component.html', styleUrls: ['./auth.component.css'] }) export class AuthComponent { isLoginMode = true; onSwitchMode() { this.isLoginMode = !this.isLoginMode; } onSubmit(form: NgForm) { console.log(form.value); form.reset(); } }
